typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory) external returns (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory)
function (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory) external returns (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory)

returns._0: uint for the current Testable timestamp.

params.perpetual: perpetual contract whose funding rate identifier that the calling contracts wants to get a funding rate for.

returns._0: FixedPoint.Signed representing the funding rate for the given contract. 0.01 would represent a funding rate of 1% per second. -0.01 would represent a negative funding rate of -1% per second.

setCurrentTime(uint256).details: Will revert if not running in test mode.

params.time: timestamp to set current Testable time to.

setRewardRate(address,(uint256)).details: Callable only by the Perpetual contract.

getCurrentTime().notice: Gets the current time. Will return the last time set in `setCurrentTime` if running in test mode. Otherwise, it will return the block timestamp.

getFundingRateForContract(address).notice: Gets the latest funding rate for a perpetual contract.

setRewardRate(address,(uint256)).notice: Set the reward rate for a specific `perpetual` contract.
